description: This file defines an API client class using the Dio HTTP client package for Dart, providing configured DIo instance management, interceptors for authentication and logging, and utility methods.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A singleton-style class providing a configured Dio HTTP client instance, with support for interceptors and reset functionality.

methods.name: instance
methods.description: Provides a singleton instance of Dio, configured with base options, authentication, and logging interceptors.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the internal Dio instance, useful for logout or reinitialization.
